record.id: field.name="lookup.fields" and file.name="validity" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: lookup.fields
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: The names of the input fields to copy from the record selected using the Val Query or the Select Query to the record being validated.
This is a required field if a file name is defined.

detail.detail: Each entry is validated against the <filename> database dictionary (dbdict).
If any element is not a valid field name, a window is opened from which you must select a valid field name.
The data type of each element must be the same as the data type defined at the Field Level in this Validity record.
There is a one-to-one relationship between this array and the Val Fields array.
